gnoll.name: Gnoll
description:
The Neutrals - Gnoll [R]
Units:
+10% attack rate
-30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+20% damage
-5% cost

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Magic:
Fear (Reduces unit's damage by 25%)
Golem Summon (Summons 1 Mud Golem for 30s)
Agitating Scream (+25% dmg in 600 AoE for 20 sec)

Traits: A very primitive and brutal race, Gnolls thrive in causing as much havoc as possible, while avoiding the big fight. Due to the lack of intelligence among Gnolls, their magic is rather weak, however they compensate for it with their physical power.

Difficulty: Beginer
Created: by Artimenius1307

The Neutrals - Gnoll [R]
Units:
+10% attack rate
-30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+20% damage
-5% cost

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Magic:
Fear (Reduces unit's damage by 25%)
Golem Summon (Summons 1 Mud Golem for 30s)
Electroshock (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: A very primitive and brutal race, Gnolls thrive in causing as much havoc as possible, while avoiding the big fight. Due to the lack of intelligence among Gnolls, their magic is rather weak, however they compensate for it with their physical power.

Difficulty: Beginer
Created: by Artimenius1307

night.name: Night Elf
description:
The Ancients - Night Elf [Q]
Units:
+1.5 HP/sec regeneration

Buildings:
+0.5 HP/sec regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Magic:
Rejuvenation (Heals 125 HP over 5s)
Entangling Roots (Deals 25 dmg/sec for 4s)
Lesser Starfall (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: Dedicated and specialized units, trained to fulfil their role to the max. Balanced and strong race without apparent weaknesses. Its full potential is impresive but it rises slowly and can be hard to reach.

Difficulty: Skilled

Gives: bonus attack rate, chance to stun and dmg
Affects: Transmorph
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv3: +15% attack rate, 30% for 30 dmg, 1.2 sec
Lv4: +20% attack rate, 40% for 40 dmg, 1.4 sec

Lv2: 20% for 20 dmg / 20% on -6 armor for 80 sec
Lv3: 30% for 30 dmg / 30% on -9 armor for 100 sec
Lv4: 40% for 40 dmg / 40% on -12 armor for 120 sec

newRaces.name: Venthyr
newRaces.description:
The Chaos - Venthyr [A]
Units:
+10% life steal (affects organic units only)
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+0.5 HP/sec regeneration

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armors
-10% research speed

Magic:
False Life (Resurrects 1 friendly unit for 20s) (doesn't affect Venthyr Warrior and Acolyte)
Fire Rain (Deals 100 damage in AoE)
Anima Infusion (dispels upgrades penalty from 1 Venthyr Warrior) (transforms Acolyte into Blood Knight)

Traits: Venhtyr from Revendreth are one of the four covenants in Shadowlands. They feast upon the souls of prideful and vain in their gothic kingdom of wealth and suffering. The race is hard to understand at first, while being rather weak at the start of the game. With the help of researches, slaves and cheap defensive abilities perform efficiently at withstanding enemy's offensives. Become more powerful in the late game once they have access to more slaves, souls and blood to satiate their thirst. Main bulk of units is small in numbers but great in strength.

Difficulty: Skilled
